knimeNode.name: TableRow To Variable
knimeNode.shortDescription: Defines new flow variables based on a single row of the input table and exposes them using a variable connection.

fullDescription.intro: This node uses a single row of a data table to define new flow variables. The names of the variables are defined by the column names and the variable assignments (i.e. the values) are given by the values in the row. The variables are exposed using a variables out connection.
fullDescription.option: If selected the node fails with an error on Missing Values or empty tables.
If selected the node replaces Missing Values or empty table columns by either integer, double, or String values as defined.
If selected the node ignores Missing Values or empty table columns.

ports.inPort: The table whose first(!) row will constitute variables' values.
